job_description:
Introduction to Caddie

Caddie AI is building the future of sales by completely changing what “email” looks like. Gmail is great for personal use, but it comedically terrible for sales. We’re building the new operating system for sales, powered by AI ⚡. We are a Y Combinator company and have recently raised $3M+ from top tier investors.

We're building our core product in stealth so you won't find anything online about it. We'd love to share the sneak peak over our first call.

About The Role

Building something incredible, from scratch. That’s right, you would be one of only two engineers on our team helping us build the future of sales with AI. We’re building a new product from the ground up and we need your help. From pixels to deployment to AI models and everything in between. We need you to craft the experiences of the future and bring AI into them. You’ll get to work closely with the founders of Caddie to not only set a technical direction but also influence the trajectory of the company.

What We’re Looking For

We’ll keep it short. We’re looking for great people rather than checking 100 boxes.

4+ years of experience building modern web applications
Degree in Computer Science or related discipline
Full-stack experience that includes React, Typescript, RESTful APIs, Postgres, AWS/ECS
Great bonus if you have experience with NextJS, NestJS, Pulumi, Terraform, Domain driven design, LLama 2, GPT-4, AWS Sagemaker, Micro services.
A passion for building something incredible from the ground up
A startup mindset (collaborate, move quickly, iterate)
You live in (or near) Toronto or Vancouver, Canada.

An “Extreme” Vacation Policy 😎

We believe that taking time off is essential for mental health and enjoying life beyond work. It also turns out it’s great for productivity. That’s why we close the company for 6 weeks a year 🤯. In addition, you have 2 more weeks you can take whenever you like. Come do the best work of your life, and get time back for everything else that matters.

Highlights

⚡ 2nd Software Engineer on the team

💫 Work on exciting AI products

🏖️ 8 weeks vacation

💰 Significant equity ownership

🕋 Build a product from scratch

🚀 Join the ground floor of a rocketship
